name: Path
description: A winding trail or road, representing journey, choices, and the direction one takes in life.

person: A guide or mentor who helps others find their way
Someone who leads others down the wrong path or into danger
creatureTrap: Creatures that patrol or guard specific routes or territories
Hazards that block progress or force difficult detours
place: A route that leads to important destinations or discoveries
A path that leads to danger, dead ends, or becomes impassable
treasure: Items found along the way that aid in travel or exploration
Obstacles or tolls that must be paid to continue forward
situation: Clear direction and progress toward goals
Being forced to take difficult detours or face unexpected obstacles
